mapper.sql: id, virtual_group_id, android_device_policy_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time
mapper.insert: insert into android_device_virtual_group (virtual_group_id, android_device_policy_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time) values (#{virtualGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into android_device_virtual_group
virtual_group_id,
android_device_policy_id,
create_date,
create_user,
update_date,
update_user,
delete_time,
#{virtualGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update android_device_virtual_group
virtual_group_id = #{virtualGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update android_device_virtual_group set virtual_group_id = #{virtualGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.id, T1.name, T2.id as collectionId, T2.name as collectionName FROM virtual_group T1 LEFT JOIN virtual_collection T2 ON T1.collection_id = T2.id AND T2.delete_time is null WHERE T1.delete_time is null and T1.org_id = #{orgId} ORDER BY T1.weight DESC
select t1.virtual_group_id as virtualGroupId from android_device_virtual_group t1 where t1.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update android_device_virtual_group set delete_time = now() where android_device_policy_id = #{id} and delete_time is null
mapper.select: select t1.virtual_group_id as virtualGroupId from android_device_virtual_group t1 where t1.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.android_device_policy_id as androidDevicePolicyId, t1.virtual_group_id as virtualGroupId, t1.update_date as updateDate, t1.create_date as createDate from android_device_virtual_group t1 left join android_device_policy t2 on t1.android_device_policy_id = t2.id where t1.delete_time is null and t2.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id != #{params.id} and t1.virtual_group_id = #{params.virtualId} and t2.is_enable = 1 and t2.org_id = #{params.orgId} order by t1.update_date desc
